text: The Salesman (, released in France as Le Client) is a 2016 Iranian French drama movie directed by Asghar Farhadi and starring Shahab Hosseini, Taraneh Alidoosti, Babak Karimi, Mina Sadati. It won an Academy Award in 2017. ==Other websites== * Category:2016 drama movies Category:Iranian movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies directed by Asghar Farhadi
title: The Salesman (2016 movie)
